title: Ticket #6243: Small UI improvements.
description:
ToddT suggests, after using v8.7.1.:

  1. Confirmation request should accept 'yes' or 'no' case-insensitively, and also 'y' or 'n' (also case-insensitively).
  2. If user says no, explicitly say/confirm that annex was not launched.
  3. If user says yes, explicitly say that annex was launched and that it will take ~3? (check) minutes to launch and join your pool (or longer, for Spot).
  4. When annex is launched, explain pile of hex numbers.
